sen.j: 本町通（ほんまちどおり）は、京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Hommachi-dori Street is a north-south running street in Kyoto City.
The Hommachi-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.
The Honmachi-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)東岸にあり、同じく南北の通りである川端通・師団街道の東側、大和大路通の西側に位置する。
sen.e: Located on the east side of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system), it runs east of the Kawabata-dori Street and the Shidan-kaido Road, both of which are equally north-west streets, and west of the Yamato-oji-dori Street.

Located on the east side of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system), it runs east of Kawabata-dori Street and Shidan-kaido Road, both of which are streets running north-west streets, and located west of Yamato-oji-dori Street.

Located on the east side of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system), it runs east of Kawabata-dori Street and Shidan-kaido Road, both of which are streets running north-south, and located west of Yamato-oji-dori Street.

sen.j: 北は五条通から、南は伏見区内で直違橋通（すじかいばしどおり）となり、国道24号につながっている。
sen.e: In the north it starts from the Gojo-dori Street; in the north it continues as the Sujikaibashi-dori Street in the Fushimi Ward and then the National Highway Route No. 24.
In the north it starts from Gojo-dori Street; while from the south it continues as Sujikaibashi-dori Street in Fushimi Ward and then connects to National Highway Route No. 24.
In the north it starts from Gojo-dori Street; while from the south it continues as Sujikaibashi-dori Street in Fushimi Ward and then connects to National Highway Route No. 24.

sen.j: 道のりの大部分がかつての伏見街道に合致する。
sen.e: The route largely corresponds to the former Fushimi-kaido Road.
The route largely corresponds to former Fushimi-kaido Road.
The route largely corresponds to former Fushimi-kaido Road.

sen.j: 東山区内においては、通りに沿って、北から東山区本町一丁目から本町二十二丁目とナンバリングされた町名の両側町が形成されている。
sen.e: In Higashiyama Ward Ryogawa-cho (town consisted the both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 1 to 22 from the north--that is 1 chome, Hommachi to 22 chome, Hommachi Higashiyama Ward

In Higashiyama Ward Ryogawa-cho (town which exists on both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 1 to 22 from the north--that is 1 chome, Hommachi to 22 chome, Hommachi Higashiyama Ward

In Higashiyama Ward Ryogawa-cho (town which exists on both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 1 to 22 from the north--that is 1 chome, Honmachi to 22 chome, Honmachi Higashiyama Ward

sen.j: 直違橋通の名は、七瀬川に架けられている橋の名前（直違橋）に由来する。
sen.e: The name of the Sujikaibashi-dori Street originates from the name of a bridge (Sujikai-bashi bridge).over the Nanase-gawa river.
The name of Sujikaibashi-dori Street originates from the name of a bridge (Sujikai-bashi bridge).over Nanase-gawa river.
The name of Sujikaibashi-dori Street originates from the name of a bridge (Sujikai-bashi Bridge) over Nanase-gawa river.
sen.cmt: ピリオド削除スペルを修正

sen.j: この「直違橋」の名は、川に対して橋が斜めに架けられていたことにちなむ。
sen.e: The name "Sujikai-bashi" comes from the bridge that crossed the river diagonally.
The name "Sujikai-bashi" comes from the bridge that crossed the river diagonally.
The name 'Sujikai-bashi' comes from the bridge that crossed the river diagonally.

sen.j: この直違橋の南側に深草直違橋南一丁目、北側に深草直違橋北一丁目が位置する。
sen.e: South of the Sujikai-bashi bridge, 1 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Minami is located, whereas north of the bridge, 1 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Kita is located.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Minami 1 Chome is located south of the Sujikai-bashi bridge, whereas Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Kita 1 Chome, is located. north of the bridge.
Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Minami 1 Chome is located south of the Sujikai-bashi Bridge, whereas Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi-Kita 1 Chome, is located north of the bridge.
sen.cmt: スペース削除スペルを修正ピリオド削除

sen.j: その北側に通りにそって、深草直違橋二丁目から深草直違橋十一丁目までナンバリングされた町名の両側町が形成されている。
sen.e: North of 1 Chome, Ryogawa-cho (town consisted the both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 2 to 11 from the north--that is 2 Chome to 11 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: North of 1 Chome, Ryogawa-cho (town consisted the both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 2 to 11 from the north--that is 2 Chome to 11 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.

North of 1 Chome, Ryogawa-cho (town consisted the both sides area of the street) is arranged along the street; where towns have numbers within their names from 2 to 11 from the north--that is 2 Chome to 11 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.

sen.j: 大日本帝国陸軍第16師団 (日本軍)が深草の地にあり、深草直違橋五丁目近傍には師団司令部が置かれた。
sen.e: Dai Juroku Shidan (16th division) of the Imperial Japanese Army was once located in Fukakusa, and its divisional headquarters were near 5 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.
Dai Juroku Shidan (16th division) of the Imperial Japanese Army was once located in Fukakusa, and its divisional headquarters were near 5 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.
Dai Juroku Shidan (16th division) of the Imperial Japanese Army was once located in Fukakusa, and its divisional headquarters were near 5 Chome, Fukakusa-Sujikaibashi.

sen.j: その建物は、現在、聖母学院本館として遺っている。
sen.e: The building the headquarters remains as Honkan (main building of Kyoto/Fujimori Campus), Seibo Gakuin School
The headquarters building remains as Honkan (main building of Kyoto/Fujimori Campus), Seibo Gakuin School
The headquarters building remains as Honkan (main building) of Kyoto/Fujimori Campus, Seibo Gakuin School.

sen.j: 沿道には軍人湯と称する銭湯もあり、軍によって栄えた名残を今に伝えている。
sen.e: A public bath named Gunjin-yu is found along the street, showing that the town throve because of the presence of the military facilities.
A public bath named Gunjin-yu is found along the street, evidence that the town used to thrive because of the presence of the military facilities.
A public bath named Gunjin-yu is found along the street, evidence that the town used to thrive because of the presence of the military facilities.

sen.j: 五条通から国道24号までのほとんどの区間で、北向き一方通行（二輪車を除く）である。
sen.e: Most sections from the Gojo-dori Street to the National Highwy Route No. 24 are one-way traffic heading north (for all vehicles except two-wheel vehicles).
Most sections from the Gojo-dori Street to the National Highwy Route No. 24 are one-way heading north (for all vehicles except two-wheel vehicles).
Most sections from the Gojo-dori Street to the National Highway Route No. 24 are one-way heading north (for all vehicles except two-wheel vehicles).

sen.j: 本町九丁目において、東海道本線・東海道新幹線によって分断されている（歩行者用の跨線橋は存在する。
sen.e: In 9 chome, Hommachi, the street is divided by the Tokaido Main Line and the Tokaido Shinkansen. (A bridge over railway is available for pedestrians.)
In 9 chome, Hommachi, the street is divided by the Tokaido Main Line and the Tokaido Shinkansen. (A pedestrian bridge exists over the train tracks)
In 9 chome, Honmachi, the street is divided by the Tokaido Main Line and the Tokaido Shinkansen. (A pedestrian bridge exists over the train tracks.)
sen.cmt: スペルを修正ピリオド補足

sen.j: ）が、本町八丁目（塩小路通）から本町十丁目（泉涌寺道）にかけて、西側の通りへの迂回路が存在する。
sen.e: There is a detour from 8 chome, Hommachi (the Shiokoji-dori Street) to 10 chome, Hommachi (Sennyuji-michi), which is connected to the street west of the railway.
There is a detour from 8 chome, Hommachi (the Shiokoji-dori Street) to 10 chome, Hommachi (Sennyuji-michi), which is connected to the street west of the railway.
There is a detour from 8 chome, Honmachi (the Shiokoji-dori Street) to 10 chome, Honmachi (Sennyuji-michi), which is connected to the street west of the railway.

sen.j: この迂回路は新本町通という名称を持つ。
sen.e: The detour is called Shin-motomachi-dori Street.
The detour is called Shin-motomachi-dori Street.
The detour is called Shin-motomachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 大部分の区間は京都市道であるが、深草稲荷御前町～師団街道第一軍道間は京都府道201号中山稲荷線となっている。
sen.e: Most sections are designated Kyoto City Road except for the section between Fukakusa-inari-onmae-cho and Daiichi Gundo (first military road), Shidan-kaido road, which belongs to Nakayama-Inari-sen, Kyoto Fudo 201 Go (Kyoto Prefectural Road 201).

Most sections are designated Kyoto City Road except for the section between Fukakusa-inari-onmae-cho and Daiichi Gundo (first military road), Shidan-kaido road, which belongs to Nakayama-Inari-sen, Kyoto Fudo 201 Go (Kyoto Prefectural Road 201).

Most sections are designated Kyoto City Road except for the section between Fukakusa-inari-onmae-cho and Daiichi Gundo (first military road), Shidan-kaido road, which belongs to Nakayama-Inari-sen, Kyoto Fudo 201 Go (Kyoto Prefectural Road 201).
